AvailableRotors - Enum Class in analysis
AvailableRotors Each constant corresponds to a pool of available rotors to choose from for EnigmaAnalysis THREE - "I", "II", "III" FIVE - "I", "II", "III", "IV", "V" ELEVEN - "I", "II", "III", "IV", "V", "VI", "VII", "VIII", "IG", "IIG", "IIIG" THREEG - "IG", "IIG", "IIIG"

backward(int) - Method in class enigma.Rotor
Virtually the same as forward(int c) but named backward to help read the code when the character has been reflected and is being enciphered backwards through the rotors
